author: EdJenner
title: UH-OH! The Brutal Truth Just Revealed About Liberal Senators Opposing Trump’s Pick, Betsy DeVos
text:
Go to Article 
The National Education Association and the American Federation of Teachers lobbied senators and worked very hard to defeat the nomination of Betsy DeVos for Secretary of the Department of Education. Why? Because DeVos was an advocate for school choice. From Daily Caller: DeVos, a long-time school choice advocate from Michigan, was the architect of Detroit’s […] Comment on this Article Via Your Facebook Account Comment on this Article Via Your Disqus Account Follow Us on Facebook!
